mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_email=#{user_email} AND user_pw=MD5(#{user_pw})
mapper.insert: insert into `user` ( login_provider, user_email, user_pw, user_nick, user_birth, target_amount, created_date, modified_date ) values ( #{login_provider}, #{user_email}, MD5(#{user_pw}), #{user_nick}, #{user_birth}, #{target_amount}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE() )
